name: 悪島
message: "Heh, heh, heh!"

name: 悪島
message: "Never asked if maybe it was TOO easy! Did you, CRIMINAL SCUUUUUUM?!
Suddenly, a booming voice echoes through the warehouse.

name: 蒼葉
message: "Akushima?!"

name: 悪島
message: "Not just meeee!"
Cops swarm out of the darkness, surrounding us.

name: 悪島
message: "I bet you thought you were sooooo clever, slipping out of the slums like that. TOO BAD!"

name: 悪島
message: "While you were screwing around, WE were CLOSING THE TRAP!"

name: ミンク
message: "...Persistent son of a bitch."

name: ミンクチームＡ
message: "...Sorry, boss."
Mink's men have turned pale. The air is tense enough to cut with a knife.
Akushima must've been tailing them.
A fatal mistake. I expect Mink to fly into a rage.

name: ミンク
message: "We'll assign blame later. First we deal with this."

name: ミンクチームＡ
message: "...Yes boss!"

name: ミンクチームＢ
message: "Yes boss!"
...Not what I was expecting.
Mink's words have steadied his men.
Selfish and violent. That's how I've always thought of him, but now...
Now I understand him even less.

name: ミンク
message: "I'd say they've got about fifty men."
Mink quickly assesses the situation. There are only ten of us, even counting me.
It's hard to imagine us getting out of there in one piece, no matter how many weapons we have.

name: 蒼葉
message: "What can we do...?"
Mink throws something at me.
I catch it. A handgun.

name: ミンク
message: "Watch your own ass."

name: 蒼葉
message: "You want me to use this?"

name: ミンク
message: "If you have a better idea, let me know. ...Everyone ready?"

name: ミンクチームＢ
message: "Yes boss!"

name: ミンクチームＡ
message: "This is our fuckup. We'll pay our dues."

name: ミンク
message: "We can do the math later. First, we get out of here. ...Let's go!"
At his signal, Mink's men scatter.
